laboratory_examinations.findings: 6.6% (49 mmol/mol), fluctuated between 5.7-6.4% (39-46 mmol/mol) until 2019 with a value of 6.4/6.6 (46/49 mmol/mol).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased to the diabetes range (>6.5% [48 mmol/mol]) over time.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 102 mg/dl (5.7 mmol/L), indicative of mild impaired fasting glucose (IFG).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: 2018 OGTT showed normal fasting glucose levels.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 1-hour: normal; 2-hour: normal, no evidence of impaired glucose tolerance (IGT).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Second OGTT in 2018 showed improved glucose tolerance with a 2-hour value of 63 mg/dl (3.5 mmol/L).
Remained within the normal range over time.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Varied between 4.5% (26 mmol/mol) to 5.7% (39 mmol/mol), with most recent being 5.7% (39 mmol/mol) in 2020.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: A notable increase from 4.5% in 2016 to 5.7% in 2020.
Indicated a rising trend of glucose levels over the years.
Indicated impaired glucose metabolism leading to T2D diagnosis.
